overview: Pro Wrestling Fujiwara Gumi was a shoot style professional wrestling promotion based in Tokyo, Japan. This event was held on September 28th, 1991 at Hakata Starlanes in Fukuoka, Japan and presented the following matches: Kazuo Takahashi vs. Lato Kiraware, Yusuke Fuke vs. Wellington Wilkins Jr., Naoki Sano vs. Bart Vale, Masakatsu Funaki vs. Mark Rush & Wayne (Ken) Shamrock vs. Minoru Suzuki.
title: PWFG: Battle of The Lions
